attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: Well, I got hungry one night and decided to order some pizza, and too my disappointment this so-called App did not allow me to do so. I was naturally very perplexed by this predicament that I was in so I went to my home screen and I realized was not the Pizza Hut app that I was promised. In my not so humble opinion, I believe that all apps that are the Pizza Hut app are fated to get a five-star review and all apps that are not deserve a 1-star review. This app, therefore stands beside the latter. A 1-star review. SAD!!!!!
